'''Howard''' is the handyman in Ross' building, who's retiring in [[The One With The Girl Who Hits Joey]]. Everyone donates $100 to give a party for him, but Ross doesn't want to, because he just moved in. Howard is only seen on screen for a little while, this is when all the neighbours are holding him up in the air chanting "Howard, Howard, Howard,".
